name: TapSpin
description:
Hold on the ball and spin it for money To buy new upgrades and skins!

Okay this time I won't lose my files and cancel stuff. I put all the files in google drive.

This game is a remake of one of my older games, its a mobile game where you hold on a ball to spin it and earn cash for new skins. This new remake has upgrades (Only 1 finished so far)

When  the game gets finished it will have 3 worlds and more upgrades.

QNA!

How long did it take to make this version of the remake?

Well about 3 days and I never got to sleep.

Where is the old version?

The old version is Below the remake.

When was the old version made?

1 year ago.

Why did you never make the old version public?

It was just for me and my friends.
